column4: Get that gag off or stop talking, you're driving me nuts.
What's up doc?
What's up nurse?
Hey, it's the new nurse!
Yo DialogPlayerName.  You got in trouble again?  Do you need anything?
Hey DialogPlayerName.  What do you want?
Hey girls!  (She looks around the meeting room for approval.)  It's the new patient.
What do you want?
I'm surprised you don't know, I'm DialogCharacterName.  I'm the girl you talk to if you need something.
I'm listening.  What do you need?
You should know me, I'm DialogCharacterName.  I'm the best patient around.  (She smirks.)
I can see that you need help, but what's in there for me?  Give me 10$ and I'll help you out.
(She shakes her head no.)
It is?  (She thinks.)  Look!  A patient is trying to escape!  (She points behind you.)
What do you need?  A smoke?  A vibrator?  Some help with a jacket?  I'm here for you, and your money.
Sure, the price is 1$ per smoke, do you want one?
I have a vibrating wand I can sell you.  It's used and it's not cheap, it goes for 80$.  Do you want it?

column3: I want to get out of here.
column4: I can't help you there.  You can always try to fight your way out, but you'll get in trouble later.
Forget it girl.  I'm here to do business, not to struggle.
Bondage is free but freedom has a price.  How tight do you want it?
Alright.  You know where to find me if you need something else.
(You smoke with her for a while, it's kind of relaxing.)  Anything else you need?
Whatever!  Anything else you need?
(She sells you the used vibrating wand and grins.)  Have fun!  I'm sure you'll get popular with that toy.

column3: No way!  80$ for a used vibrator!
column4: Don't take it then.  I'm sure you'll come crawling back later to get it.

column3: Can you do it for free?
column4: No way.  You pay or you stay like that.
It's a pleasure to do business with you.  (She releases you and smirks.)  Anything else you need?
Stop begging.  You pay or you stay like that.
Sucker!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Sucker!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Catch me then!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Chicken!  (She uses a few items on you and makes chicken sounds.)
Alright!  (She uses some items on you and smirks.)

column3: I can take it.  Do your worst.
column4: Enjoy your struggling.  (She uses lots of items on you and grins.)
Whatever!  Anything else you need?
